name: HT AI Playground
description: AI assistant workspace for my Revit API, pyRevit, Dynamo scripts and prompt engineering.

examples.name: List pyRevit pushbuttons
examples.prompt: List all pushbuttons in my pyRevit extension with their panel names and descriptions.

examples.name: Check extension.json layout
examples.prompt: Check if extension.json has valid panel paths and tools.

examples.name: Summarize the RenameViews script
examples.prompt: Explain what RenameViews.py does and suggest improvements for naming logic.
